member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect
member.summary: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be a reflective surface. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with an infinitely distant light source (such as the sun) applying the specular portion of the Phong lighting model.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Distant-specular lighting effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DistantSpecularEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the DistantSpecularEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.SpecularExponent
member.summary: Specular power for the Phong lighting model. Larger values produce more sharply defined highlights. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.SpecularAmount
member.summary: Intensity of the specular light. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for DistantSpecular effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.LightColor
member.summary: Color of the incoming light. Default value white.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.HeightMapScale
member.summary: Height map scale factor in the Z direction. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.HeightMapKernelSize
member.summary: Size of the Sobel filter kernel used to convert the input heightmap to surface normal vectors. Default value (1,1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.HeightMapInterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode used to filter the height map. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Elevation
member.summary: Elevation of the light source, measured in degrees in the YZ plane, counter-clockwise relative to the Y axis. Default value 0, range 0 to 360.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Azimuth
member.summary: Direction of the light source, measured in degrees in the XY plane, counter-clockwise relative to the X axis. Default value 0, range 0 to 360.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1DistantSpecular GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantSpecularEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.
